TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit BlobHttpResponseParsers extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a set of methods for parsing a response containing blob data from the Blob service.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.LeaseDuration GetLeaseDuration (System.Net.HttpWebResponse response);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.LeaseDuration GetLeaseDuration(class System.Net.HttpWebResponse response) cil managed

Docs.summary: Extracts the lease duration from a web response.
Docs.returns: A enumeration from the web response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the appropriate header is not present, a status of <xref:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.LeaseDuration.Unspecified> is returned.

Docs.exception: The header contains an unrecognized value.
